page.title: 02LOCAL NEWS
page.content: {Stories from the local newspaper.} {Friday November 30th 1984 This Saturday Councillor Rankine holds his surgery from 10.30 to 11.30 a.m.in the community centre.Local residents are reminded that the centre is a collection point for the childrens toy appeal.So far there has been poor response,you can hand them in at any time.The centre Christmas dance is on Saturday December 8th from 7p.m.until midnight.The bar and tickets costing Â£1.00 are on sale at the centre. {Friday January 11th 1985 Two local boys Alan Smith of West Calder High School and Malcolm Bissett of Parkhead Primary were one of the 53 couples to enter the Lothian under 12's Christmas Badminton Tournament.The boys played well and reached the final where they lost a very close match.
